means: 清楚表示( manifest的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He manifested a pleasing personality on stage.
sentence.Network_cn: 在台上他表现出惹人喜爱的个性。

sentence.Network_en: Social tensions were manifested in the recent political crisis.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近的政治危机显示了社会关系的紧张。

sentence.Network_en: Her actions manifested a complete disregard for personal safety.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的行动表明她全然不顾个人安危.

PerfectNetExp.abs: As the years went on , their bond manifested itself in frustrating ways ., 时间一年年过去 , 她们之间的纽带更加明显 , 令我倍感挫败.
Attribute is manifested in the female perception , communication , nature , beauty and wisdom of nature ., 而女性属性则表现为感知性 , 沟通性 , 美感性和智慧性.
His defensiveness was manifested in hurt silence ., 他的防卫心理在痛苦的沉默中表现出来.
On the anniversary of her birth we never manifested any signs of rejoicing ., 她生日那一天 , 我们都没有显露出一点欢乐的迹象.

entry.def: If you say that something is manifest, you mean that it is clearly true and that nobody would disagree with it if they saw it or considered it.

example.ex: There may be unrecognised cases of manifest injustice of which we are unaware.
example.tran: 也许还有一些我们不知道的明显不公平现象被忽视了。

entry.def: If you manifest a particular quality, feeling, or illness, or if it manifests itself, it becomes visible or obvious.

example.ex: He manifested a pleasing personality on stage...
example.tran: 在台上他表现出惹人喜爱的个性。

example.ex: The virus needs two weeks to manifest itself.
example.tran: 这种病毒潜伏两周时间才会发作。

auth_sentence.content: If God manifested Himself...He would be quickly disowned.
auth_sentence.res_content: If God manifested Himself...He would be quickly disowned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If God manifested Himself...He would be quickly disowned.

auth_sentence.content: Perfection is merely an illusion in manifested appearances.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perfection is merely an illusion in manifested appearances.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perfection is merely an illusion in manifested appearances.

auth_sentence.content: This difference in attitude is manifested in our way of thinking.
auth_sentence.res_content: This difference in attitude is manifested in our way of thinking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This difference in attitude is manifested in our way of thinking.

Sentence.sentence: Named after a river that passes through the Congo, the Ebola virus originally manifested itself in the interior of Africa in 1976.
Our managerial skills are measured by the competence manifested in accelerating this process.
